title: LF friendly people to play and practice English with me......
body: Hi everyone, I'm a girl player from China and I'm an international student  studying in United States. I'm new here so my English speaking is not very good. But I really like to play LOL so I want to find some friends who like it too and can practice English with me at the same time. We can play together and use skype or curse to communicate.   We can also share culture differences or interesting things to each other. Please reply to me if you are interested.
